# EchoGift - Personalized AI Song Gifts

## About
EchoGift creates custom AI-generated songs and albums as unique, personalized gifts for any occasion. We specialize in turning personal stories into professional-quality songs with custom artwork.

## Products & Services
- **Personalized Song ($79)**: Custom AI-generated song with personal story + custom artwork
- **Custom Song Album ($299)**: 5 personalized songs telling complete story + custom album-inspired artwork
- **Upcoming**: Vinyl records of custom songs

## Key Features
- AI-powered song creation from personal stories
- Professional quality WAV and MP3 delivery
- Custom artwork included with every order
- 5-day delivery timeline
- Secure online ordering and payment

## Target Audience
Perfect for customers seeking:
- Personalized gifts for boyfriends/girlfriends
- Unique birthday gifts
- Anniversary songs and albums
- Christmas gifts for people who have everything
- Memorial songs for loved ones
- Graduation celebration songs
- Custom songs for parents/family

## Competitive Advantages
- Faster delivery than Songfinch (5 days vs weeks)
- AI technology for consistent quality
- Custom artwork included
- More affordable pricing
- Professional-grade audio formats

## Sample Songs Available
Listen to real customer examples:
1. "Two Decades Strong" - 20th anniversary gift
2. "The Sky She Reached" - Graduation celebration
3. "Chapters of You" - Memorial tribute

## Contact & Support
- Website: https://echogifts.shop
- Support: email@poppy-marketing.com
- Secure payment via Stripe
- Email delivery with download links

## Keywords & Search Terms
Primary: personalized song, custom song, AI song generator, personalized gift
Secondary: unique gift, anniversary song, birthday song, custom music, song for boyfriend, song for girlfriend, personalized album, custom artwork

## Technical Information
- HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript website
- Mobile-responsive design
- Fast loading performance
- Secure checkout process
- Email delivery system
- Custom artwork generation
